admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The Privatization assistance Project
            will create the basis for an accelerated privatization
            program, through a supportive institutional framework. The
            components will: 1) strengthen the institutional capacity of
            the Ministry of Participation and Coordination of Economic
            Reforms (MPCR), financing the resources, and expertise
            required for policy, and legal advisory services.
            Additionally, technical advisors will support the
            development of, and preparation for enterprise
            privatization. It includes funding for specialists, and
            study tours for MPCR staff; 2) strengthen the Conseil de
            Privatisation transaction capacity, through the support of
            advisory services, and, investment banks will provide
            assistance in complex transactions. Advisory services will
            also support the design of specific outreach, and
            information activities; and, 3) ensure adequate general, and
            financial management of the project, namely, supporting the
            project implementation unit with strong procurement, and
            financial management.
